results.title: Desire
results.brief_description: This clever, noirish comedy is shot in black and white without dialogue by the director of Australian hit movies Love and Other Catastrophes (1996) and Strange Planet. (1999) A lonely laboratory worker becomes obsessed with a woman on a train - with deadly consequences.

results.title: Cog
results.brief_description: A 2D digitally composited animation, with a distinctive 3D look. The mechanical, metalloid, surreal environment, as well as the characters, were created from real life cut-outs (from photographs) of everyday objects. COG is a parable about the beauty of life being ground down by an industrial society.

results.title: Dearest Cait...love Sally
results.brief_description: This mature, and affecting film follows the thoughts of a young girl who has just lost her best friend. Winner of overall first prize at the ACMI Infogrammes 2001 diegesis Secondary Student Media Festival.

results.title: Breakaway
results.brief_description: A girl dressed as an angel runs through an underground train station. An experimental film composed of surreal moments and psychological drama filmed in classic expressionist style.

results.title: Manus
results.brief_description: This technically accomplished student work uses a clever combination of stop frame animation and sound to create a playful and absorbing short reminiscent of the Brothers Quay.

results.title: Whyspers
results.brief_description: Massive bronze heads atop towers of crumbling stone communicate via small grey servants. One day a thousand years later a visitor interrupts a conversation. A chinese whispers style mutation occurs as a result.

results.title: Brassketeers
results.brief_description: With a nod to the tradition of stories like Coppelia where statues come to life after dark, comes this delightful film that combines live action and animation. In this story, it is those famous Melbourne pieces of public art. From Australia’s premier centre for animation and interactive media RMIT AIM.

results.title: Les Grenouilles
results.brief_description: Les Grenouilles is a musical telling of the familiar love triangle scenario. All action takes place on ice skates and all dialogue is delivered in song. The film is a stop motion clay animation work and the Director’s tribute to all the Doris Day films ever made.

results.title: Payback
results.creator_credit: Penny McDonald, Warwick Thornton and Blackfella Films
results.brief_description: Paddy, an old aboriginal man, has been in jail for twenty years. It is the day of his release. Paddy knows of two laws - white law and black law. The twenty years he has spent doing time for the white man’s law has been in preparation for this one - his payback day.

results.title: Just
results.brief_description: In a room above a street, Radiohead play their song, ‘Just’. In the street below, a man lies on the ground, attracting a number of concerned, irritated and worried passers-by. But his condition may be contagious…..
